articles.title: Jayson Tatum acknowledges challenges of returning this season for Celtics
articles.description:
"It is a thought: Do I come back? Should I wait? It’s something that I honestly, recently, in the last two weeks or so just kind of contemplate every single day.”

articles.title: Cam Newton continues to discredit Drake Maye’s role in Patriots’ Super Bowl run
articles.description:

articles.title: Pro Football Hall of Fame releases statement amid Bill Belichick snub
articles.description:

articles.title: Read Robert Kraft’s statement on reported Bill Belichick Hall of Fame omission
articles.description:

articles.title: Former NFL executive Bill Polian reportedly isn’t sure if he cast a HOF vote for Bill Belichick
articles.description:
After initially insisting that he voted for the former Patriots head coach, Polian later admitted he "could not remember with 100% certainty."
